body_html:
In the end it worked by just building with the normal:

bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

but during the ./configure, I had to select No for the following (Yes for the ones not mentioned):

Do you wish to build TensorFlow with the XLA just-in-time compiler (experimental)?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with VERBS support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with OpenCL support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with CUDA support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with MPI support?
body_text:
In the end it worked by just building with the normal:
bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
but during the ./configure, I had to select No for the following (Yes for the ones not mentioned):
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with the XLA just-in-time compiler (experimental)?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with VERBS support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with OpenCL support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with CUDA support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with MPI support?
body:
In the end it worked by just building with the normal:

`bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

but during the `./configure`, I had to select **No** for the following (_Yes_ for the ones not mentioned):

Do you wish to build TensorFlow with the XLA just-in-time compiler (experimental)?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with VERBS support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with OpenCL support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with CUDA support?
Do you wish to build TensorFlow with MPI support?
